description: This is a React component file for a Next.js application, specifically a page for displaying bug details in an automotive bug tracker. It imports UI components such as Sidebar, TopNav, ProtectedRoute, and BugDetailClient, and defines static parameters for pre-rendering. The file includes a dummy bug data object used to render the bug detail page.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Provides static parameters for Next.js static site generation, returning at least one bug ID for build-time rendering.

methods.name: BugDetailPage
methods.description: Main React component function that renders the bug detail page using a hardcoded mock bug object.
